name: Purple Guy 2 Foxes Demo
description:
This is Purpley's 2nd Demo to be out and only 3 worlds can be played

<,>: Move and Jump

Space: to Pick

P: Pause

No Save data Here!

Esta es la segunda demostración de Purpley y solo se pueden jugar 3 mundos
